title: Science Domain Learning Designer Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in science education and basic concepts of educational design
context.additional_context: A course designed to strengthen professionals' expertise, focusing on developing field-centered instructional design capabilities by applying design-based research methodologies. Physical/technical infrastructure is established to support collaboration tools in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain a learning design process tailored to science education environments, divided into three or more stages.
Learners can design learning modules applicable to real-world science education settings using design-based research methodologies.
Learners can develop assessment tools for customized science education design by analyzing the needs of large learner groups.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
